explains: v. 溅；洒；污蔑；洒落；溅出水滴
n. 溅；洒；泼溅的污迹；少量；短暂的一段声音；（雨等的）滴滴答答声

sentences.en: It gets nice and cool after a spatter of rain.
sentences.cn: 下了一阵雨，天气凉快多了。

sentences.en: Don't spatter the soup onto the table.
It may seize up and spatter and generally be disagreeable.
sentences.cn: 糖浆会结块并且飞溅起来，这通常让人恼火。
